data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Houaphan, Laos to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Houaphan, Laos
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Houaphan, Laos. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 39 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Houaphan, Laos that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Houaphan, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Pong people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Houaphan, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Over 96.23 percent of the people of Houaphan are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Please, convict the 7,280 believers in Houaphan, Laos to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
